## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/settheory/expander">Expander</a> - A callback function that can transform a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> representing a set into a fully expanded list of elements.

Expanders provide a way for users to define named sets that can be used in DAG expressions.

Definition at line 86 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/settheory-h">SetTheory.h</a>.
